name: Sacred Geometry #1
description:
Somewhere beyond the visible universe, geometric shapes populate the thread of reality.

"To say that the universe is an illusion (Maia) is not to say that it is not real, it is to say that it is not what it seems, that it is something constantly being built.” Carlos Castañeda.

Space-time has many more layers than those perceived by the naked eye. Christianity, Judaism, Hinduism, Islamism, and other religions have touched this knowledge somehow, and the concept of Sacred Geometry is present across many ancient cultures.

I dare to bring such invisible realms into existence through a real image, here available as my genesis NFT. 

Sacred Geometry #1 (edition of 2), is part of the project Impermanent Sculptures, started in 2015 and is still ongoing. It is the result of laser cut stencils palette, fire sparkles and light painting photography done onsight with later adjustments on Photoshop.
.
.
.
Vitor Schietti’s work is dedicated to the visual representations of dreams and memories as building blocks of one’s identity. His motifs go from landscape to portrait, often applying long exposure and light-painting techniques.
